soos-sca-scan.clientId.markdownDescription: SOOS Client ID - get yours from https://app.soos.io/integrate/sca

soos-sca-scan.apiKey.markdownDescription: SOOS API Key - get yours from https://app.soos.io/integrate/sca

soos-sca-scan.projectName.markdownDescription: Project Name - this is what will be displayed in the SOOS app.

soos-sca-scan.apiURL.markdownDescription: SOOS API URL - Intended for internal use only, do not modify.

soos-sca-scan.directoriesToExclude.markdownDescription: Listing of directories or patterns to exclude from the search for manifest files. eg: **bin/start/**, **/start/**

soos-sca-scan.filesToExclude.markdownDescription: Listing of files or patterns patterns to exclude from the search for manifest files. eg: **/req**.txt/, **/requirements.txt

soos-sca-scan.packageManagers.markdownDescription: Select package managers to include when searching for manifest files. If none are selected, all package managers will be included.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.link:soos-api-client: npm link @soos-io/api-client && npm run build && npm link
scripts.patch-api-client: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run setup:clean && npm install @soos-io/api-client@latest --save-exact && npm install && npm run check
